content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to real-time data on public response to The Advocate's efforts to become more inclusive. However, based on the news and articles available online, it seems that the response has been mixed. Some readers and members of the LGBTQ+ community appreciate the publication's efforts towards diversity and inclusion, while others feel that it has not gone far enough in representing different intersectional identities and perspectives. The Advocate has also faced criticism from some conservative groups and individuals for its progressive stance and advocacy for LGBTQ+ rights. Overall, it appears that The Advocate's efforts to become more inclusive are ongoing and subject to ongoing scrutiny and debate.
